meanings.sent1: She always gives an unbias opinion on the matter.
meanings.sent2: It is important to remain unbias when making decisions.
meanings.sent3: The unbias judge made a fair ruling in the case.
meanings.sent4: Her unbias perspective helped to resolve the conflict.
meanings.sent5: Being unbias allows for a more objective viewpoint.

meanings.sent1: He tried to unbias his research by considering all perspectives.
meanings.sent2: It can be challenging to unbias oneself from personal beliefs.
meanings.sent3: She decided to unbias her thoughts before reaching a conclusion.
meanings.sent4: The goal is to unbias the data for accurate results.
meanings.sent5: Learning to unbias oneself is a valuable skill.
